title: The Chosen of Shar
content:
ou stumble on a Metallic Mask, the Quest will be updated, as the group will reach the conclusion that some hellish fiends could have killed the Shar worshipers. Upon opening the doors past where Nere was trapped, you discover the bridge to the ancient temple has been destroyed - there must be another way in. You can find Night Orchid at Ruined Battlefield (X:54, Y:175) and gift it to Shadowheart.
